testcase.name: AsksAboutToppings

failure.message:
../settings/unittest.cc:58 Value of: MatchesRegex( ".*[Tt]omato sauce.*[Cc]heese.*[Pp]epperoni.*[Jj]alapeno.*[Oo]nion.*pizza[.]bmp.*") Expected: matches regular expression ".*[Tt]omato sauce.*[Cc]heese.*[Pp]epperoni.*[Jj]alapeno.*[Oo]nion.*pizza[.]bmp.*" Actual: "Welcome to PizzaMaker 2.0!

Would you like a pizza?
(y/n): 
Would you like tomato sauce?
(y/n): 
Would you like cheese with that?
(y/n): 
Would you like pepperoni?
(y/n): 
Would you like jalapeno with that?
(y/n): " Input: y n n n n n
Ask about tomato sauce, cheese, pepperoni, jalapeno, and onion in that order, and tell the user the filename at which their pizza was saved, pizza.bmp.
